channel.title: Metal Cable Gland on Herfom
channel.description: Recent content in Metal Cable Gland on Herfom

item.title: Air Vent Cable Gland
item.description: Introduction Thread Specifications: M (Metric), PG, G (PF), NPT Material: Nickel Plated Brass Protection Level: IP68 Working Temperature: -40℃ to 100℃ Feature: Waterproof and breathable, Balance pressure Support non-standard customization Specification 1.Metric Thread Item No. Cable Range Φ (mm) Thread O.D (mm) Thread Length (mm) Spanner Size (mm) Other Size Please contact sales M8x1.25 CGS-AIR-M8-4 2-4 8 5 11/11 M10x1.

item.title: Brass Cable Gland
item.description: Introduction Thread Specifications: M (Metric), PG, G (PF), NPT Material: Nickel Plated Brass Protection Level: IP68 Working Temperature: Static -40℃ to 100℃, or can heat up to 120℃ instantly. (Can be customized from -60℃ to 220℃) Product Features: Special clamping jaw and clamping ring design, large clamping cable range, strong tensile strength, waterproof, dustproof, salt-resistant, weak acid, alcohol, grease and general solvents Support non-standard customization Structure Parts A, C, and F are made of nickel-plated brass.

item.title: EMC Antimagnetic Cable Gland
item.description: Introduction Thread Specifications: M (Metric), PG, G (PF), NPT Material: Nickel Plated Brass Protection Level: IP68 Working Temperature: Static -40℃ to 100℃, or can heat up to 120℃ instantly. (Can be customized from -60℃ to 220℃) Product Features: This product is specially designed to treat the metal cable fixing head as an end body. When the isolated cable enters the fixing head, the copper contact piece attached in the fixing head can be used to contact the metal in the cable.

item.title: Porous Multiple Holes Cable Gland
item.description: Introduction Thread Specifications: M (Metric), PG, G (PF), NPT Material: Brass / Stainless Steel Protection Level: IP68 Working Temperature: Static -40℃ to 100℃, or can heat up to 120℃ instantly. (Can be customized from -60℃ to 220℃) Product Features: Special clamping jaw and clamping ring design, large clamping cable range, strong tensile strength, waterproof, dustproof, salt-resistant, weak acid, alcohol, grease and general solvents Support non-standard customization Structure Parts A, C, and F are made of Nickel-plated brass / Stainless Steel.

item.title: Silicone Cable Gland
item.description: Introduction Thread Specifications: M (Metric), PG, G (PF), NPT Material: The main part of the cable gland is made of brass nickel plating. The clamping parts and sealing parts are made of silica gel. Protection Level: IP68 Working Temperature: -50℃~+250℃ Support non-standard customization. Specification 1.Metric Thread Item No. Cable Range Φ (mm) Thread O.D (mm) Panel Mounting Hole (mm) Thread Length (mm) Joint Length (mm) Spanner Size (mm) Other Size Please contact sales M8x1 CGS-SIL-M8 5.

item.title: Stainless Steel Cable Gland
item.description: Introduction Thread Specifications: M (Metric), PG, G (PF), NPT Material: Stainless steel 304/316 Protection Level: IP68 Working Temperature: Static -40℃ to 100℃, or can heat up to 120℃ instantly. (Can be customized from -60℃ to 220℃) Product Features: Special clamping jaw and clamping ring design, large clamping cable range, strong tensile strength, waterproof, dustproof, salt-resistant, weak acid, alcohol, grease and general solvents Support non-standard customization Structure Parts A, C, and F are made of stainless steel 304/316.
